org.corfudb.infrastructure

Interface IDataStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataStore

    public interface IDataStore
    Key Value data store abstraction that provides persistence for variables that need retain values across node restarts or need to be accessed by multiple modules/threads.

    The key value store is partitioned by prefix (namespace/table). All values being stored under a prefix should be of a single Type or Class.

    Created by mdhawan on 7/27/16.
